sentences.en: Almost certainly, life can develop and exist in much more inhospitable climates.
sentences.cn: 几乎可以肯定的是, 生命能够在比这不利得多的气候条件下生存发展.

sentences.en: Be not inhospitable to strangers lest they be angles in disguise.
sentences.cn: [不要冷漠对待陌生人,因为他们有可能是天使所乔装.]-莎士比亚书店.

sentences.en: He trekked across some of the most inhospitable terrain in the world.
sentences.cn: 他长途跋涉，穿越了世界上一些最荒凉的地带。

sentences.en: Her greeting was cold and inhospitable.
I had scarcely passed my twelfth birthday when I entered the inhospitable regions of examinations.
sentences.cn: 我跨进那冷淡无情的考区时才十二周岁.

sentences.en: In reality, the moon is more inhospitable than the most desolate place on Earth.
sentences.cn: 其实, 月球比地球上最荒凉的地方还要不适于居住.

sentences.en: It is inhospitable to turn a stranger away.
sentences.cn: 把陌生人拒之门外不是好客的表现.

sentences.en: It was inhospitable of you not to offer her a drink.
sentences.cn: 你未给她饮品是待客不周.

sentences.en: It's a barren, inhospitable, but beautiful part of the world.
sentences.cn: 这里贫瘠而荒凉, 但同时也是世界一部分美丽的所在.

sentences.en: Sir, you are naturally kind and human -- you shall not become cruel and inhospitable on my account.
sentences.cn: 先生, 你生性慈爱而讲人道, 你不要为了我的缘故而变得凶残而不客气.

sentences.en: That's probably the most bare, bleak, barren and inhospitable island I've ever seen.
sentences.cn: 那可能是我见过的最荒凉的岛屿，荒无人烟，寸草不生。

sentences.en: The once inhospitable landscape is now tamed.
sentences.cn: 那曾经荒凉的土地现在已经被开垦出来了.

sentences.en: They are extremely inhospitable these days.
sentences.cn: 这些天来,他们极其冷淡.
这些日子他们极不友好.

sentences.en: This was a region of early settlement with relatively inhospitable conditions for agriculture.
sentences.cn: 这是初期殖民的地区,农业条件并非优良.

sentences.en: Within two years they had tamed this inhospitable landscape.
sentences.cn: 两年之内他们已经开垦了这片荒凉的土地.

trans.tran_cn: 不好客的，不友好的，不适于居住的
trans.tran_en: an inhospitable place is difficult to live or stay in because the weather conditions are unpleasant or there is no shelter
